entry.title: Derby Originals Contoured Natural Leather Chafe-Free English Girth
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: English Girths
Price: 24.95

Derby Originals Contoured Natural Leather Chafe-Free English Girth

A classic, natural leather girth designed to keep your horse happy and comfortable. The contoured shape design relieves any shoulder irritation, and the soft leather prevents any chafing, sore or rubs. Features durable, triple layer elastic at one end and reinforced roller buckles for easy girth adjustment. Available in classic black color and a wide variety of sizes. 

Key Features & Item Specifications

  • Designed with 100% real leather, not synthetic like most English girths on the market today.
  • Features triple elastic at one end of the girth and heavy duty roller buckles for easy girth adjustment.
  • Contour design provides shoulder relief for your horse, and smooth natural leather helps to prevent chafing, sores and rubs.
  • Available in traditional black color and a wide variety of sizes.

entry.title: Paris Tack Super Soft Triple Layer Schooling 1" Wide English Stirrup Leathers for Daily Use
entry.summary:
Vendor: Paris Tack
Type: Stirrup Leathers & Irons
Price: 24.95

DESIGNED FOR EVERYDAY USE - these stirrup leathers were designed to be used for schooling and everyday use, and are available in a wide range of colors and sizes to suit almost any rider.

TRIPLE LAYER DESIGN - these stirrup leathers feature a synthetic material sandwiched between fine leather to produce a stirrup that is incredibly strong. These stirrups will also not stretch over time like how solid leather ones will.

STAINLESS STEEL BUCKLES - these stirrup leathers have rustproof stainless-steel buckles that are designed to last. These buckles are reinforced with sturdy nylon where they connect to the leather straps for extra strength.

AVAILABLE IN MULTIPLE COLORS AND SIZES - these stirrup leathers are available in the colors Havana and Chestnut and in the sizes 45” (Kids), 54” (Adult), and 60” (Extra Long).

entry.title: Derby Originals Air Tech Chafe-Free Dressage Girth
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: English Girths
Price: 29.95

Derby Originals Air Tech Chafe-Free Dressage Girth

One of Derby Originals most advanced Dressage girths. Designed with your horses health and comfort in mind, this girth features Derby Originals Air Tech textured breathable material to ensure constant air flow during riding and prevent rubs and sores associated with traditional leather girths. The contoured shape of the girth and innovative sponge like material adapts to the shape of your horses girth area to not only keep it in place but to prevent painful pinching. Additional key features include durable elastic on both ends for a comfortable, snug girth fit and stainless steel roller buckles for easy adjustment. Can be cleaned easily with a damp towel, comes in a traditional black color suitable for dressage, and  billet keepers for a smooth, seamless look. A must have for every equestrians tack collection. 

Key Features & Item Specifications

  • Designed with Derby Originals Air Tech textured material to ensure constant air flow during riding and prevent rubs and sores associated with traditional leather girths.
  • Features a contoured shape and sponge like material to adapt to the shape of your horses girth area and to keep it in place without pinching.
  • Includes durable elastic on both ends of girth with stainless steel roller buckles for easy adjustment.
  • Comes in a traditional black color suitable for the dressage discipline, and  billet keepers for a smooth, seamless look.
  • Can be easily cleaned with a damp towel quickly and efficiently.

entry.title: Paris Tack Super Soft Triple Layer Riveted 1" Wide English Stirrup Leathers with One Year Warranty
entry.summary:
Vendor: Paris Tack
Type: Stirrup Leathers & Irons
Price: 39.95

Paris Tack has been producing a wide variety of high-quality English stirrup leathers for over 20 years. Our stirrup leathers are all backed by a six-month to one-year limited manufacturer’s warranty and are guaranteed to be free of quality or manufacturing defects. We offer stirrup leathers in a variety of leather types, thicknesses, with or without synthetic reinforcement, and in the colors Black, Havana, and Chestnut, and all standard sizes: 45” (ideal for children or shorter riders), 54” (universal adult sizing), and 60” (extra long for tall and long-legged riders). If you are looking for the perfect stirrup leathers to use with your English saddle, Paris Tack is sure to offer the right style, size, and color to suit you!

TRIPLE LAYER DESIGN - these stirrup leathers feature a synthetic material sandwiched between fine leather to produce a stirrup that is incredibly strong. These stirrups will also not stretch over time like how solid leather ones will.

STAINLESS STEEL BUCKLES - these stirrup leathers have rustproof stainless-steel buckles that are designed to last. These buckles are reinforced with sturdy nylon where they connect to the leather straps for extra strength.

REINFORCED STAINLESS STEEL PLATES - these stirrup leathers have stainless steel plates under the buckles to provide added strength without creating a bulge under the saddle, to increase your comfort.

AVAILABLE IN MULTIPLE COLORS AND SIZES - these stirrup leathers are available in the colors Black, Havana, and Chestnut, and in the sizes 45” (Kids), 54” (Adult), and 60” (Extra Long).

ONE YEAR WARRANTY - these stirrup leathers are backed by a one-year limited manufacturer’s warranty against quality or manufacturing defects. Check out derbyoriginals.com for more information.

entry.title: Derby Originals Stainless Steel Weighted Jointed Flex Comfort Stirrup Fillis Irons with Rubber Pads
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Stirrup Leathers & Irons
Price: 59.95

Derby Originals line of premium stainless steel stirrup irons features a broad array of sizes and styles of stirrup so that every rider, regardless of size or sport, can find their perfect pair of irons.

DESIGNED WITH YOUR COMFORT IN MIND - Derby Originals brand stirrups are only made from high-grade stainless steel and are designed to offer a comfortable option for every rider.

ALLEVIATES KNEE PAIN - these ergonomically designed stirrup irons feature jointed sides that flex, unlike traditional solid metal stirrups, making for a smoother and more comfortable ride. These stirrups prevent the knee strain common with regular fillis stirrups.

FLEXIBLE JOINTED DESIGN - these stirrups feature stainless steel springs that allow for maximum flexibility and shock absorption for both you and your horse. These stirrups are ideal for high-intensity sports.

STAINLESS STEEL CONSTRUCTION - our stirrups are only made from stainless steel, and unlike other inferior stirrups will never rust. When you invest in Derby brand stirrups, you’re investing in quality.

WEIGHTED DESIGN - our fillis irons are weighted so that if you lose your stirrup, they will hang down and it will be much easier for you to regain your footing than with a non-weighted stirrup.

ALLEVIATES KNEE PAIN - these ergonomically designed stirrup irons feature an offset eye that prevents the knee and ankle strain common with regular fillis stirrups and aids in proper foot positioning by naturally helping to keep the heel down.

entry.title: Derby Professional Air Tech Breathable Elastic English Girth with Removable Fleece Padding
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: English Girths
Price: 29.95

Derby Professional Air Tech Breathable Elastic English Girth with Removable Fleece Padding

Keep your horse cool and comfortable with this state of the art English girth by Derby Originals. This girth features Air Technology to provide cooling and ensure ultimate air circulation during a riding session. The padded leather with sponge like characteristics adapt to your horses unique shape to provide ultimate comfort. Nylon webbing reinforcement ensures strength and durability for extended use. One elastic end and one nylon end, both with roller buckle hardware make for easy girth tightening. Available in a variety of sizes, the color black and white fleece.

Key Features and Item Specifications

  • AIR TECH DESIGN-  designed with Derby Originals Air Technology to provide cooling and ensure ultimate air circulation during a riding session. 
  • COMFORTABLE- features padded leather with sponge like characteristics to adapt to your horse's unique shape. Removable fleece pad for additional comfort.
  • DURABLE: Features nylon webbing reinforcement to ensure strength and durability for extended use.
  • CONVENIENT- Features one elastic end and one nylon end, and roller buckle hardware on both ends for easy girth adjusting. 
  • CLASSIC: available in a wide variety of sizes and black color with white fleece.

entry.title: Derby Jointed Uxeter Kimberwick Bits Stainless Steel
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: English Bits
Price: 14.95

This item is Uxeter Jointed Kimberwicke with curb chain and hooks.Â  Slots in the D-rings allow the rider to use it either more like a snaffle (use the upper slot for your reins) or as a curb bit (use the lower slot). This is an excellent bit for when you need just a little more control. This bit has a slightly softer action than our straight-mouthed Uxeter Kimberwicke bit w/low port.

  • Jointed for a softer snaffle-like action
  • Includes curb chain and hooks
  • Available in 5" & 5.25" mouthpiece

entry.title: Derby Originals Stainless Steel Free Foot Safety English Stirrup Irons
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Stirrup Leathers & Irons
Price: 49.95

Derby Originals Stainless Steel Free Foot Safety English Stirrup Irons 

Prevent any injury and keep yourself safe with Derby Originals Free Foot Safety English Stirrup Irons. The unique curvature design of the stainless steel frame allows for a quick removal of the foot in the case of an emergency, and a quick regain in the event the stirrup is lost or dropped during riding. Can be compared to breakaway stirrups without the hassle of the rubber bands. Features removable, replaceable rubber stirrup pads with a grip pattern.

Key features & Item specifications 

  •  Special curvature design on the stainless steel frame of these stirrups allow for quick removal of the foot from the iron in case of an emergency, and quick regain in the case of a loss or drop during riding.
  •  Feature removable rubber pads with a grip pattern that can be replaced if damaged or worn out. 
  • Designed with strong, sturdy stainless steel and  to fit most English stirrup leathers. 
  • Available in three sizes : Adult 4-3/4", Kids 4-1/4", and X-Large 5-1/4".
  • Item includes one pair of stirrup irons.

entry.title: Paris Tack English Leather Girth Extender, Available in Multiple Colors
entry.summary:
Vendor: Paris Tack
Type: English Girths
Price: 17.95

Paris Tack has been a producer of all types of English tack and goods for 20 years, from everyday classics to the modern and innovative. Our English tack pieces are only made from real leather and feature high-quality hardware, and are designed to be both attractive and functional.

  • DESIGNED WITH YOUR HORSE’S COMFORT IN MIND - Paris Tack has been making English tack for over 20 years, and is dedicated to putting your horse’s comfort and safety, as well as your own, first.
  • UNIVERSAL DESIGN FITS MOST GIRTHS - these 13” long girth extenders feature a 1” wide leather body that is designed to accommodate most English girths and straps, for the ability to use with multiple girths and saddles, and for multiple horses.
  • FEATURES ELASTIC ROLLER BUCKLE ENDS - this girth extender has a set of elastic roller buckle ends on each side that makes cinching up your girth easier with less hassle. Our high-quality metal roller buckles are also rustproof.
  • AVAILABLE IN THREE COLORS - this English girth extenders are available in the colors Black, Havana, and Chestnut to match virtually any girth and tack set.
  • HIGH-QUALITY DESIGN - this girth extender is made from high quality double layered and stitched leather, double-layered sturdy elastic, and rustproof metal roller buckle ends.
